title: Best of the Program | Guests: Carol Roth & Jeff Brown | 6/16/22
description:
Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss the absurd conspiracy theory regarding Rep. Lauren Boebert. Author and recovering investment banker Carol Roth discusses the abysmal position the American economy is in due to federal interference. Jeff Brown, founder and chief investment analyst for Brownstone Research, joins to go over the country's worsening energy crisis and the future of A.I.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
